text: Art Club Vice President

Hello,
Excuse me for intruding.

Ah, Juri-san...
Is the rough draft ready...?
Motion

Wow... There's this much...?
It's not just one...!

Yes, I couldn't decide on the composition...
so if Houkura could choose the best one...

Amazing...! They're all so good...!
I want to use all of them.

They all have this sense of dynamism...
You can tell they love running.
They seem like they could jump out at any moment.

I... I can't run,
so maybe that's why I got so into it.
Huh...?

Oh... Not in a weird way.
I mean, not because of injuries or anything...

.......... When I enrolled, I was torn between
joining the track team and the art club.

I liked running,
but I was better at art... so I chose this.
I see...

But watching people run like this... even though I wasn't
that good, sometimes I think maybe I should have tried...
...I wonder if it's possible to do both.

I think it's possible,
but I don't hear about many examples...

...And besides, I'm already a second-year student,
so... the art club keeps me busy too.
I see...
Motion

..........
What should I do...
